scope: World & Systems: 11x11 Biome Map, Weather, Temperature
goal: Rebuild the 11x11 map per GDD coordinates (desert/oasis west, lake center rows 1-5 cols 1-9, spring north, winter east, mixed south with path/cabin), and wire biome weather/temperature effects into descriptions and player warmth.
decisions: Preserve the 11x11 grid but align biomes to the specified quadrants and path/cabin coordinates (start 10,5; cabin 6,5).
Define weather tables per biome (desert: clear/heat_wave/sandstorm; north: clear/cloudy/light_rain/fog; east: clear/light_snow/blizzard) and apply time-of-day temperature modifiers to player comfort.
Keep indoor rooms temperature-stable with fireplace heat adding to warmth when active.
plan: Adjust map generation to match the GDD coordinates (desert/oasis west, lake center rows 1-5 cols 1-9, spring north, winter east, mixed/path south; cabin at 6,5 and start at 10,5).
Implement biome-specific weather tables and temperature modifiers (time-of-day + biome) and apply to player warmth/comfort in the tick loop.
Update descriptions/look to reflect the new biome layout and weather cues; verify persistence and start positions.
Run tests/build to ensure map generation, tick, and descriptions still function.
notes: Keep serialization backward compatible; changes mostly impact map generation and runtime weather/temperature logic.
Cabin/WoodShed objects stay anchored at their coordinates.
Visited tiles are tracked in player state; web map now fogs unvisited areas.
